main.name: Karan Sharma
main.description: I have recently graduated in Masters of Software Engineering from Concordia University, Montrel, Quebec
main.bio:
Committed and dedicated software professional with 3 years of experience in Agile software development and maintenance. 
  I love the fact that technologies change people's life. So I've been spending one third of my life on exploring information technology industry with my keyboard. This website is where I post my works, feel free to explore by yourself.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me through email..

resume.skillmessage: Here is the sneak peek about some of the my skills.

education.school: IK Gujral Punjab Technical University, India
education.degree: Bachelors in Technology, Computer Science Engineering

work.title: Mobile Application developer
description: -Worked in agile scrum, worked collaboratively with other developers, data analysts, product owners to challenge the status quo and improve the lives of our customers, one release after the other.
-Participating code reviews and addressed review comments.
-Implemented MVP and MVVM architecture to handle complex code and providing code modularity.
-Manage multiple priorities and deadlines in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.
-Continuous integration and development of application. Updated the continuous integration/deployment scripts as necessary for integration processes.
-Improve the algorithm for the video streaming over the stream of data received.

work.title: Junior Mobile Application Developer
description: -Developed application for news readers and allow users to publish news articles with 2k-3k active users with 4.7/5 rating.
-Users are able to customize the news feeds according to their taste.
-Build complex application architecture using RxJava and Dagger.
-Worked closely with product owner to customize the application.
-Collaborated with QA on identifying bugs and implementing fixes and minor application enhancements.
-Participated in design and wireframe review to provide a technical perspective on implementation.

work.title: Intern Application Developer
description: -Developed a food delivery application for the food fanatics those can search for restaurant within the area of 10km and order for the food.
-Consumed Payment gateway API for secured and successful transactions.
-Increased customer satisfaction rate by 20% and application ratings from 3.7 to 4.2/5 by resolving issues based on customer feedback.
-Participated in agile software development with daily scrum meetings and bi-weekly sprints.
